author: newsr.in
title: Indian cricket is moving in good direction: Sachin Tendulkar
text:
*New Delhi*: Two years after his retirement, the iconic Sachin Tendulkar reckons that Indian cricket is moving in "good direction" though there is still room for improvement.
Tendulkar said as long as there is drive, things will be on track for the young team Indian team, which is currently engaged in a home series against ... Â»
